points.title: App required for this service requires broad device permissions
points.status: "Device information. We collect information from and about the device you use to access our services. For example, we may collect device identifiers, browser types, device types and settings, operating system versions, mobile, wireless, and other network information (such as internet service provider name, carrier name and signal strength), and application version numbers."

points.title: Some personal data may be kept after the end of the data retention period or a request for erasure
points.status: "We may also retain personal data if required by law, or for our legitimate interests, such as abuse detection and prevention, and defending ourselves from legal claims. "

points.title: User accounts can be terminated after having been in breach of the terms of service repeatedly
points.status: "Accordingly, it is VPN Hamster’s policy to promptly terminate without notice the accounts of those determined by VPN Hamster to be repeat infringers, where a repeat infringer is an end user of the VPN Services who has been notified by VPN of infringing transmissions activities more than twice (“Repeat Infringer Policy”). "

points.title: Your use is throttled
points.status: "We may impose usage or Service limits, suspend Service, or block certain kinds of usage in our sole discretion to protect users or the Service. "

points.title: Information is gathered about you through third parties
points.status: "Information provided to us by third parties"

points.title: Your personal data may be sold or otherwise transferred as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction
points.status: "If ownership or control of all or part of our services, assets, or business changes, we may transfer your information to the new owner."

points.title: You can retrieve an archive of your data
You can limit how your information is used by third-parties and the service
You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data
Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service
points.status: "Note that deleting or blocking certain cookies could adversely impact the proper operation of our services."

points.title: Third-party cookies are used for advertising
points.status: "We may allow our business partners to place certain tracking technologies in our services. These partners use these technologies for the following purposes: [...] To Serve Ads. Ad networks may use these technologies to display ads which they think will be more relevant to you."

points.title: Third-party cookies are used for statistics
points.status:
"We may allow our business partners to place certain tracking technologies in our services. These partners use these technologies for the following purposes:
●      To provide our services. Some business partners who help us to provide  For Analytics. To help us understand how you use our services."

points.title: Tracking pixels are used in service-to-user communication
points.status:
"Pixel Tags / Page Tags / Web Beacons / Tracking Links
These are small, hidden images and blocks of code placed in web pages, ads, and our emails that allow us to determine if you perform a specific action"

points.title: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and device fingerprinting
points.status:
"Pixel Tags / Page Tags / Web Beacons / Tracking Links
These are small, hidden images and blocks of code placed in web pages, ads, and our emails that allow us to determine if you perform a specific action."

points.title: You can opt out of targeted advertising
points.status: "If you opt out from personalized advertising, you may still see non-personalized ads."

points.title: Your personal data is used to employ targeted third-party advertising
points.status: "We provide limited personal data about you to such third party advertising networks to enable them to provide their services."

points.title: This service shares your personal data with third parties that are not involved in its operation
points.status: "We provide limited personal data about you to such third party advertising networks to enable them to provide their services."

points.title: The service will resist legal requests for your information where reasonably possible
points.status: "Subject to the foregoing, we may share your information if we are required to do so by applicable law; to comply with our legal obligations; to comply with legal process; and to respond to valid law enforcement requests relating to a criminal investigation, or alleged or suspected illegal activity that may expose us, you, or any of our other users to legal liability. If we share your information for these purposes, we limit the information shared to what is legally necessary, and challenge information requests that we believe are unlawful, overbroad, or otherwise invalid."

points.title: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation
points.status: "We may disclose your information in the following circumstances: [...] Affiliates and third party service providers."

points.title: Third parties are involved in operating the service
points.status: "To help us provide some aspects of our services, we work with our affiliates and trusted third parties."

points.title: Your personal information is used for many different purposes
points.status:
"We use the information we collect for various purposes described below."
Personal data is used for analytics, marketing, advertising, communication, legal compliance...

points.title: Your personal data may be used for marketing purposes
points.status: "We may use your information to provide, measure, personalize, and enhance our advertising and marketing based on our legitimate interest in offering you services that may be of interest. "

points.title: Your personal data is used for advertising
points.status: "We may use your information to provide, measure, personalize, and enhance our advertising and marketing based on our legitimate interest in offering you services that may be of interest. "

points.title: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location
points.status: "Location information. We may collect your location information based on a variety of sources, such as your device’s GPS or by calculating an approximate latitude and longitude based on your IP address."

points.title: Information is provided about security practices
points.status:
5. Security
We employ a range of administrative, organizational, technical, and physical safeguards designed to protect your data against unauthorized access, loss, or modification. We continuously work to improve such safeguards.

points.title: This service receives your precise location through GPS coordinates
points.status: "Location information. We may collect your location information based on a variety of sources, such as your device’s GPS or by calculating an approximate latitude and longitude based on your IP address."

points.title: You are prohibited from sending chain letters, junk mail, spam or any unsolicited messages
points.status: "You agree not to use the system for sending spam, port scanning, scanning for open proxies or open relays, sending opt-in email, unsolicited email or any type or version of email sent in large quantities even if the email and ultimately sent off of another server."
